title: How to Submit a New Recipe to Allrecipes

steps.headline: Visit and log into the Allrecipes website in your web browser.
steps.description: Use the "Sign In" link near the top right hand corner of the page.

steps.headline: Click the "Recipe Box" tab at the near top of the screen with your mouse.
Click the "Add Your Photo" button, if you have a photo of the already-prepared item.
Click into the "Recipe Name" box and type a personalized recipe name.
Tab to type the ingredients into the box.
steps.description: Make sure to only include only one item per line, and also make sure the ingredients are ordered in the same order as how they'd be used in the recipe. Optional items should be noted too. People tend to type the word "optional" in between a set of parentheses, but you may type this optionality by any means you may choose. But make sure your readers know this fact.

steps.headline: Tab to type the directions for making the recipe.
steps.description: Each time ↵ Enter is pressed, not only will that create a new line, but it also creates a new step!

steps.headline: Enter some commonly missed data.
steps.description: These data items include the "Prep Time", "Cook Time", "Ready In" "Number of Servings" and "Recipe Yield.

steps.headline: Type some other optional data into their representative fields.
steps.description: This data should include the recipe's "Notes", "Rating", and "Category".

steps.headline: Tab to type a "Quick description" of what type of food it is.
steps.description: Mention here if it's a fat-free or sugar-free food, or if its spicy/sugary. Tell your readers about the food item.

steps.headline: Share your recipe as a Kitchen Approved Recipe.
steps.description:
After the moderators have seen your recipe as complete and workable using the steps, and have followed the guidelines to a T, you may click the checkbox for "Share this recipe and submit it for publication as an Allrecipe's "Kitchen Approved" recipe. Chances are they seem to pick most dishes, as long as they don't have any similar items. If you don't want to share it with anyone, there's an option for not sharing it with anyone. Click the last option on the page. {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/e\/e3\/Submit-a-New-Recipe-to-the-Allrecipes-Database-Step-12Bullet1.jpg\/v4-460px-Submit-a-New-Recipe-to-the-Allrecipes-Database-Step-12Bullet1.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/e\/e3\/Submit-a-New-Recipe-to-the-Allrecipes-Database-Step-12Bullet1.jpg\/v4-760px-Submit-a-New-Recipe-to-the-Allrecipes-Database-Step-12Bullet1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":252,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":416.53846153846155,"licensing":"

License: Fair Use<\/a> (screenshot)
\n<\/p><\/div>"}

steps.headline: Click the "Preview Recipe" button.
steps.description: This added step gives you some extra protection to ensure the recipe comes out spic and span on your eyes, as well as the reader's eyes.

steps.headline: Verify the recipe is complete on the page that comes up..
steps.description:
If the item isn't correct, click the "Edit" button to adjust all incorrect data. {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/f\/ff\/Submit-a-New-Recipe-to-the-Allrecipes-Database-Step-14Bullet1.jpg\/v4-460px-Submit-a-New-Recipe-to-the-Allrecipes-Database-Step-14Bullet1.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/f\/ff\/Submit-a-New-Recipe-to-the-Allrecipes-Database-Step-14Bullet1.jpg\/v4-759px-Submit-a-New-Recipe-to-the-Allrecipes-Database-Step-14Bullet1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":271,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":447.85714285714283,"licensing":"

License: Fair Use<\/a> (screenshot)
\n<\/p><\/div>"}

tyn: Recipe to type up/submit (preferably written previously, but not mandatory that it's written down)
text:
Visit and log into the Allrecipes website in your web browser. Use the "Sign In" link near the top right hand corner of the page. Click the "Recipe Box" tab at the near top of the screen with your mouse. Click the "Add Your Photo" button, if you have a photo of the already-prepared item. Click the "Create a Recipe" button. Click into the "Recipe Name" box and type a personalized recipe name. Tab to type the ingredients into the box. Make sure to only include only one item per line, and also make sure the ingredients are ordered in the same order as how they'd be used in the recipe. Optional items should be noted too. People tend to type the word "optional" in between a set of parentheses, but you may type this optionality by any means you may choose. But make sure your readers know this fact. Tab to type the directions for making the recipe. Each time ↵ Enter is pressed, not only will that create a new line, but it also creates a new step! Enter some commonly missed data. These data items include the "Prep Time", "Cook Time", "Ready In" "Number of Servings" and "Recipe Yield. Type some other optional data into their representative fields. This data should include the recipe's "Notes", "Rating", and "Category". Tab to type a "Quick description" of what type of food it is. Mention here if it's a fat-free or sugar-free food, or if its spicy/sugary. Tell your readers about the food item. Share your recipe as a Kitchen Approved Recipe. After the moderators have seen your recipe as complete and workable using the steps, and have followed the guidelines to a T, you may click the checkbox for "Share this recipe and submit it for publication as an Allrecipe's "Kitchen Approved" recipe. Chances are they seem to pick most dishes, as long as they don't have any similar items. If you don't want to share it with anyone, there's an option for not sharing it with anyone. Click the last option on the page. {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/e\/e3\/Submit-a-New-Recipe-to-the-Allrecipes-Database-Step-12Bullet1.jpg\/v4-460px-Submit-a-New-Recipe-to-the-Allrecipes-Database-Step-12Bullet1.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/e\/e3\/Submit-a-New-Recipe-to-the-Allrecipes-Database-Step-12Bullet1.jpg\/v4-760px-Submit-a-New-Recipe-to-the-Allrecipes-Database-Step-12Bullet1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":252,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":416.53846153846155,"licensing":"

License: Fair Use<\/a> (screenshot)
\n<\/p><\/div>"} Click the "Preview Recipe" button. This added step gives you some extra protection to ensure the recipe comes out spic and span on your eyes, as well as the reader's eyes. Verify the recipe is complete on the page that comes up.. If the item isn't correct, click the "Edit" button to adjust all incorrect data. {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/f\/ff\/Submit-a-New-Recipe-to-the-Allrecipes-Database-Step-14Bullet1.jpg\/v4-460px-Submit-a-New-Recipe-to-the-Allrecipes-Database-Step-14Bullet1.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/f\/ff\/Submit-a-New-Recipe-to-the-Allrecipes-Database-Step-14Bullet1.jpg\/v4-759px-Submit-a-New-Recipe-to-the-Allrecipes-Database-Step-14Bullet1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":271,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":447.85714285714283,"licensing":"

License: Fair Use<\/a> (screenshot)
\n<\/p><\/div>"} Save your recipe. Click the "Save Recipe" button.
sentences: Visit and log into the Allrecipes website in your web browser.
Use the "Sign In" link near the top right hand corner of the page.
Click the "Recipe Box" tab at the near top of the screen with your mouse.
Click the "Add Your Photo" button, if you have a photo of the already-prepared item.
Click the "Create a Recipe" button.
Click into the "Recipe Name" box and type a personalized recipe name.
Tab to type the ingredients into the box.
Make sure to only include only one item per line, and also make sure the ingredients are ordered in the same order as how they'd be used in the recipe.
Optional items should be noted too.
People tend to type the word "optional" in between a set of parentheses, but you may type this optionality by any means you may choose.
But make sure your readers know this fact.
Tab to type the directions for making the recipe.
Each time ↵ Enter is pressed, not only will that create a new line, but it also creates a new step!
Enter some commonly missed data.
These data items include the "Prep Time", "Cook Time", "Ready In" "Number of Servings" and "Recipe Yield.
Type some other optional data into their representative fields.
This data should include the recipe's "Notes", "Rating", and "Category".
Tab to type a "Quick description" of what type of food it is.
Mention here if it's a fat-free or sugar-free food, or if its spicy/sugary.
Tell your readers about the food item.
Share your recipe as a Kitchen Approved Recipe.

After the moderators have seen your recipe as complete and workable using the steps, and have followed the guidelines to a T, you may click the checkbox for "Share this recipe and submit it for publication as an Allrecipe's "Kitchen Approved" recipe.
Chances are they seem to pick most dishes, as long as they don't have any similar items.
If you don't want to share it with anyone, there's an option for not sharing it with anyone.
Click the last option on the page.

{"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/e\/e3\/Submit-a-New-Recipe-to-the-Allrecipes-Database-Step-12Bullet1.jpg\/v4-460px-Submit-a-New-Recipe-to-the-Allrecipes-Database-Step-12Bullet1.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/e\/e3\/Submit-a-New-Recipe-to-the-Allrecipes-Database-Step-12Bullet1.jpg\/v4-760px-Submit-a-New-Recipe-to-the-Allrecipes-Database-Step-12Bullet1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":252,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":416.53846153846155,"licensing":"

License: Fair Use<\/a> (screenshot)
\n<\/p><\/div>"} Click the "Preview Recipe" button.
This added step gives you some extra protection to ensure the recipe comes out spic and span on your eyes, as well as the reader's eyes.
Verify the recipe is complete on the page that comes up..
If the item isn't correct, click the "Edit" button to adjust all incorrect data.

{"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/f\/ff\/Submit-a-New-Recipe-to-the-Allrecipes-Database-Step-14Bullet1.jpg\/v4-460px-Submit-a-New-Recipe-to-the-Allrecipes-Database-Step-14Bullet1.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/f\/ff\/Submit-a-New-Recipe-to-the-Allrecipes-Database-Step-14Bullet1.jpg\/v4-759px-Submit-a-New-Recipe-to-the-Allrecipes-Database-Step-14Bullet1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":271,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":447.85714285714283,"licensing":"

License: Fair Use<\/a> (screenshot)
\n<\/p><\/div>"} Save your recipe.
Click the "Save Recipe" button.
